file.name: cards.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
servers:
  - url: https://api.mercadopago.com
info:
  title: Mercado Pago API Reference
  version: '1.0'
paths:
  /v1/customers/{customer_id}/cards:
    get:
      tags:
        - $ref: '#/tags/checkout-pro'
        - $ref: '#/tags/checkout-api'
      summary: Get customer cards
      x-summary-i18n:
        eng: Get customer cards
        spa: Obtener tarjetas de un cliente
        por: Obter cartões de um cliente
      description: Consult a client's saved cards in order to be able to show them when making a payment.
      x-description-i18n:
        eng: Consult a client's saved cards in order to be able to show them when making a payment.
        spa: Consulta el listado de tarjetas almacenadas de un cliente para poder mostrarlas al momento de hacer un pago
        por: Consulte a lista de cartões armazenados de um cliente a fim de mostrá-los no momento de fazer um pagamento
      parameters:
        - name: customer_id
          in: path
          description: Customer's Id
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Customer's Id
            spa: Customer's Id
            por: Customer's Id
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            example: 12123adfasdf123u4u
      responses:
        '200':
          description: success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    id:
                      type: string
                      description: Card ID.
                      x-description-i18n:
                        eng: Card ID.
                        spa: Identificador de tarjeta
                        por: Identificador de cartão
                      example: '277090284'
                    date_registered:
                      type: string
                      description: null
                    date_created:
                      type: string
                      format: date
                      description: Card's date created.
                      x-description-i18n:
                        eng: Card's date created.
                        spa: Fecha de creación de la tarjeta
                        por: Data de criação do cartão
                      example: '2018-07-18T13:28:32.000-04:00'
                    date_last_updated:
                      type: string
                      format: date
                      description: Card's last modified date.
                      x-description-i18n:
                        eng: Card's last modified date.
                        spa: Última fecha de actualización de la tarjeta
                        por: Última data de atualização do cartão
                      example: '2018-08-07T12:21:32.243-04:00'
                    customer_id:
                      type: string
                      description: Customer ID.
                      x-description-i18n:
                        eng: Customer ID.
                        spa: Identificador de cliente
                        por: Identificador de cliente
                      example: 329653963-byLEdchVPhPc4H
                    expiration_month:
                      type: number
                      description: Card's expiration month.
                      x-description-i18n:
                        eng: Card's expiration month.
                        spa: Mes de expiración de la tarjeta
                        por: Mês de validade do cartão
                      example: 11
                    expiration_year:
                      type: number
                      description: Card's expiration year.
                      x-description-i18n:
                        eng: Card's expiration year.
                        spa: Año de expiración de la tarjeta
                        por: Ano de validade do cartão
                      example: 2020
                    first_six_digits:
                      type: string
                      description: Card's first six digits.
                      x-description-i18n:
                        eng: Card's first six digits.
                        spa: Primeros seis dígitos de la tarjeta
                        por: Os primeiros seis dígitos do cartão
                      example: '423564'
                    last_four_digits:
                      type: string
                      description: Card's last four digits.
                      x-description-i18n:
                        eng: Card's last four digits.
                        spa: Últimos cuatro dígitos de la tarjeta
                        por: Últimos quatro dígitos do cartão
                      example: '5682'
                    payment_method:
                      type: object
                      description: Payment method information.
                      x-description-i18n:
                        eng: Payment method information.
                        spa: Información de los medios de pago
                        por: Informação dos meios de pagamento
                      properties:
                        id:
                          type: string
                          description: Payment method ID.
                          x-description-i18n:
                            eng: Payment method ID.
                            spa: Identificador del método de pago
                            por: Identificador do método de pagamento
                          example: visa
                        name:
                          type: string
                          description: Payment method name.
                          x-description-i18n:
                            eng: Payment method name.
                            spa: Nombre del medio de pago
                            por: Nome do meio de pagamento
                          example: Visa
                        payment_type_id:
                          type: string
                          description: Payment method type.
                          x-description-i18n:
                            eng: Payment method type.
                            spa: Tipo del medio de pago
                            por: Tipo do meio de pagamento
                          example: credit_card
                        thumbnail:
                          type: string
                          description: Payment method thumbnail.
                          x-description-i18n:
                            eng: Payment method thumbnail.
                            spa: Thumbnail del medio de pago
                            por: Thumbnail do meio de pagamento
                          example: http://img.mlstatic.com/org-img/MP3/API/logos/visa.gif
                        secure_thumbnail:
                          type: string
                          description: Payment method secure thumbnail.
                          x-description-i18n:
                            eng: Payment method secure thumbnail.
                            spa: Secure thumbnail del medio de pago
                            por: Secure thumbnail do meio de pagamento
                          example: https://www.mercadopago.com/org-img/MP3/API/logos/visa.gif
                    security_code:
                      type: object
                      description: Security code information.
                      x-description-i18n:
                        eng: Security code information.
                        spa: Información del código de seguridad
                        por: Informação do código de segurança
                      properties:
                        length:
                          type: number
                          description: Security code's length.
                          x-description-i18n:
                            eng: Security code's length.
                            spa: Longitud del código de seguridad
                            por: Comprimento do código de segurança
                          example: 3
                        card_location:
                          type: string
                          description: Security code's card location.
                          x-description-i18n:
                            eng: Security code's card location.
                            spa: Ubicación del código de seguridad en la tarjeta
                            por: Localização do código de segurança no cartão
                          example: back
                    issuer:
                      type: object
                      description: Issuer information.
                      x-description-i18n:
                        eng: Issuer information.
                        spa: Información del emisor
                        por: Informações do emitente
                      properties:
                        id:
                          type: number
                          description: Issuer Id.
                          x-description-i18n:
                            eng: Issuer Id.
                            spa: Identificador del emisor
                            por: Id do remetente
                          example: 25
                        name:
                          type: string
                          description: Issuer name.
                          x-description-i18n:
                            eng: Issuer name.
                            spa: Nombre del emisor
                            por: Nome do emitente
                          example: Visa
                    cardholder:
                      type: object
                      description: Card holder information.
                      x-description-i18n:
                        eng: Card holder information.
                        spa: Información del dueño de la tarjeta
                        por: Informações do dono do cartão
                      properties:
                        name:
                          type: string
                          description: Card holder name.
                          x-description-i18n:
                            eng: Card holder name.
                            spa: Nombre
                            por: O nome
                          example: APRO
                        identification:
                          type: object
                          description: Identification information.
                          x-description-i18n:
                            eng: Identification information.
                            spa: Información de la identificación
                            por: Informação de identificação
                          properties:
                            number:
                              type: string
                              description: Identification number.
                              x-description-i18n:
                                eng: Identification number.
                                spa: Número de identificación
                                por: Número de identificação
                              example: '19119119100'
                            subtype:
                              type: string
                              description: Identification subtype.
                            type:
                              type: string
                              description: Identification type.
                              x-description-i18n:
                                eng: Identification type.
                                spa: Tipo de identificación
                                por: Tipo de identificação
                              example: CPF
                    user_id:
                      type: string
                      example: '12123adfasdf123u4u'
                    live_mode:
                      type: boolean
                      example: true
        '400':
          description: Error
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Error
            spa: Error
            por: Erro
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 100--the credentials are required.
                      - 101--the customer already exist.
                      - 102--missing customer id.
                      - 103--parameter must be an object 
                      - 104--parameter length is too large.
                      - 105--the customer id is invalid.
                      - 106--the email format is invalid.
                      - 107--the first_name is invalid.
                      - 108--the last_name is invalid.
                      - 109--the phone.area_code is invalid.
                      - 110--the phone.number is invalid.
                      - 111--the identification.type is invalid.
                      - 112--the identification.number is invalid.
                      - 113--the address.zip_code is invalid.
                      - 114--the address.street_name is invalid.
                      - 115--the date_registered format is invalid.
                      - 116--the description is invalid.
                      - 117--the metadata is invalid.
                      - 118--the body must be a Json object
                      - 119--the card is required.
                      - 120--card not found.
                      - 121--the card is invalid.
                      - 122--the card data is invalid.
                      - 123--the payment_method_id is required.
                      - 124--the issuer_id is required.
                      - 125--invalid parameters.
                      - 126--invalid parameter. You cannot update the email.
                      - 127--invalid parameter. Cannot resolve the payment method of card, check the payment_method_id and issuer_id.
                      - 128--the email format is invalid. Use 'test_payer_[0-9]{1,10}@testuser.com'.
                      - 129--the customer has reached the maximum allowed number of cards.
                      - 140--invalid card owner.
                      - 150--invalid users involved.
                      - 200--invalid range format (range=:date_parameter:after::date_from,before::date_to).
                      - 201--range attribute must belong to date entity.
                      - 202--invalid 'after' parameter. It should be date[iso_8601].
                      - 203--invalid 'before' parameter. It should be date[iso_8601].
                      - 204--invalid filters format.
                      - 205--invalid query format.
                      - 206--attributes to sort must belong to 'customer' entity.
                      - 207--order filter must be 'asc' or 'desc'.
                      - 208--invalid 'sort' parameter format.
        '401':
          description: Error
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Error
            spa: Error
            por: Erro
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - unauthorized--unauthorized.
        '404':
          description: Error
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Error
            spa: Error
            por: Erro
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - not_found--not_found.
    post:
      tags:
        - $ref: '#/tags/checkout-pro'
        - $ref: '#/tags/checkout-api'
      summary: Save card
      x-summary-i18n:
        eng: Save card
        spa: Guardar tarjeta
        por: Salvar cartão
      description: Store the card reference used by the customer in the payment securely on our servers to avoid asking for all the data in future transactions
      x-description-i18n:
        eng: Store the card reference used by the customer in the payment securely on our servers to avoid asking for all the data in future transactions
        spa: Almacena de manera segura en nuestro servidores la referencia de la tarjeta utilizada por el cliente en el pago para evitar volver a pedir todos los datos en futuras transacciones
        por: Armazena com segurança em nossos servidores a referência a um cartão utilizado pelo cliente no pagamento para evitar pedir todos os dados em transações futuras
      parameters:
        - name: customer_id
          in: path
          description: Customer's Id
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Customer's Id
            spa: Customer's Id
            por: Customer's Id
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            example: 12123adfasdf123u4u
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                token:
                  type: string
                  description: Card Token
                  example: 9b2d63e00d66a8c721607214ceda233a
      responses:
        '200':
          description: success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  id:
                    type: string
                    example: 1562188766852
                    description: id
                  expiration_month:
                    type: number
                    example: 6
                    description: expiration_month
                  expiration_year:
                    type: number
                    example: 2023
                    description: expiration_year
                  first_six_digits:
                    type: string
                    example: 423564
                    description: first_six_digits
                  last_four_digits:
                    type: string
                    example: 5682
                    description: last_four_digits
                  payment_method:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      id:
                        type: string
                        example: visa
                        description: id
                      name:
                        type: string
                        example: visa
                        description: name
                      payment_type_id:
                        type: string
                        example: credit_card
                        description: payment_type_id
                      thumbnail:
                        type: string
                        example: http://img.mlstatic.com/org-img/MP3/API/logos/visa.gif
                        description: thumbnail
                      secure_thumbnail:
                        type: string
                        example: https://www.mercadopago.com/org-img/MP3/API/logos/visa.gif
                        description: secure_thumbnail
                    description: payment_method
                  security_code:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      length:
                        type: number
                        example: 3
                        description: length
                      card_location:
                        type: string
                        example: back
                        description: card_location
                    description: security_code
                  issuer:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      id:
                        type: number
                        example: 25
                        description: id
                      name:
                        type: string
                        example: Visa
                        description: name
                    description: issuer
                  cardholder:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      name:
                        type: string
                        example: APRO
                        description: name
                      identification:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          number:
                            type: string
                            example: 19119119100
                            description: number
                          type:
                            type: string
                            example: CPF
                            description: type
                        description: identification
                    description: cardholder
                  date_created:
                    type: string
                    example: '2019-07-03T21:15:35.000Z'
                    description: date_created
                  date_last_updated:
                    type: string
                    example: '2019-07-03T21:19:18.000Z'
                    description: date_last_updated
                  customer_id:
                    type: string
                    example: 448870796-7ZjwhKGxILixxN
                    description: customer_id
                  user_id:
                    type: string
                    example: 448870796
                    description: user_id
                  live_mode:
                    type: boolean
                    example: true
                    description: live_mode
        '400':
          description: Error
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Error
            spa: Error
            por: Erro
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 100--the credentials are required.
                      - 101--the customer already exist.
                      - 102--missing customer id.
                      - 103--parameter must be an object 
                      - 104--parameter length is too large.
                      - 105--the customer id is invalid.
                      - 106--the email format is invalid.
                      - 107--the first_name is invalid.
                      - 108--the last_name is invalid.
                      - 109--the phone.area_code is invalid.
                      - 110--the phone.number is invalid.
                      - 111--the identification.type is invalid.
                      - 112--the identification.number is invalid.
                      - 113--the address.zip_code is invalid.
                      - 114--the address.street_name is invalid.
                      - 115--the date_registered format is invalid.
                      - 116--the description is invalid.
                      - 117--the metadata is invalid.
                      - 118--the body must be a Json object
                      - 119--the card is required.
                      - 120--card not found.
                      - 121--the card is invalid.
                      - 122--the card data is invalid.
                      - 123--the payment_method_id is required.
                      - 124--the issuer_id is required.
                      - 125--invalid parameters.
                      - 126--invalid parameter. You cannot update the email.
                      - 127--invalid parameter. Cannot resolve the payment method of card, check the payment_method_id and issuer_id.
                      - 128--the email format is invalid. Use 'test_payer_[0-9]{1,10}@testuser.com'.
                      - 129--the customer has reached the maximum allowed number of cards.
                      - 140--invalid card owner.
                      - 150--invalid users involved.
                      - 200--invalid range format (range=:date_parameter:after::date_from,before::date_to).
                      - 201--range attribute must belong to date entity.
                      - 202--invalid 'after' parameter. It should be date[iso_8601].
                      - 203--invalid 'before' parameter. It should be date[iso_8601].
                      - 204--invalid filters format.
                      - 205--invalid query format.
                      - 206--attributes to sort must belong to 'customer' entity.
                      - 207--order filter must be 'asc' or 'desc'.
                      - 208--invalid 'sort' parameter format.
        '401':
          description: Error
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Error
            spa: Error
            por: Erro
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - unauthorized--unauthorized.
        '404':
          description: Error
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Error
            spa: Error
            por: Erro
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - not_found--not_found.
  /v1/customers/{customer_id}/cards/{id}:
    get:
      tags:
        - $ref: '#/tags/checkout-pro'
        - $ref: '#/tags/checkout-api'
      summary: Get card
      x-summary-i18n:
        eng: Get card
        spa: Obtener tarjeta
        por: Obter cartão
      description: Check the reference information for a saved card associated with a customer
      x-description-i18n:
        eng: Check the reference information for a saved card associated with a customer
        spa: Consulta la información de referencia de una tarjeta guardada asociada a un cliente
        por: Consultar as informações de referência de um cartão armazenado associado a um cliente
      parameters:
        - name: customer_id
          in: path
          description: Customer's Id
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Customer's Id
            spa: Customer's Id
            por: Customer's Id
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            example: 12123adfasdf123u4u
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: Card's Id
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Card's Id
            spa: Card's Id
            por: Card's Id
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            example: 12123adfasdf123u4u
      responses:
        '200':
          description: success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  id:
                    type: string
                    description: Card ID.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Card ID.
                      spa: Identificador de tarjeta
                      por: Identificador de cartão
                    example: '8987269652'
                  date_registered:
                    type: string
                    description: null
                  date_created:
                    type: string
                    format: date
                    description: Card's date created.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Card's date created.
                      spa: Fecha de creación de la tarjeta
                      por: Data de criação do cartão
                    example: '2021-03-16T16:08:20.592-04:00'
                  date_last_updated:
                    type: string
                    format: date
                    description: Card's last modified date.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Card's last modified date.
                      spa: Última fecha de actualización de la tarjeta
                      por: Última data de atualização do cartão
                    example: '2021-03-16T16:08:20.592-04:00'
                  customer_id:
                    type: string
                    description: Customer ID.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Customer ID.
                      spa: Identificador de cliente
                      por: Identificador de cliente
                    example: 470183340-cpunOI7UsIHlHr
                  expiration_month:
                    type: number
                    description: Card's expiration month.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Card's expiration month.
                      spa: Mes de expiración de la tarjeta
                      por: Mês de validade do cartão
                    example: 6
                  expiration_year:
                    type: number
                    description: Card's expiration year.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Card's expiration year.
                      spa: Año de expiración de la tarjeta
                      por: Ano de validade do cartão
                    example: 2023
                  first_six_digits:
                    type: string
                    description: Card's first six digits.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Card's first six digits.
                      spa: Primeros seis dígitos de la tarjeta
                      por: Os primeiros seis dígitos do cartão
                    example: '503143'
                  last_four_digits:
                    type: string
                    description: Card's last four digits.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Card's last four digits.
                      spa: Últimos cuatro dígitos de la tarjeta
                      por: Últimos quatro dígitos do cartão
                    example: '6351'
                  payment_method:
                    type: object
                    description: Payment method information.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Payment method information.
                      spa: Información de los medios de pago
                      por: Informação dos meios de pagamento
                    properties:
                      id:
                        type: string
                        description: Payment method ID.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Payment method ID.
                          spa: Identificador del método de pago
                          por: Identificador do método de pagamento
                        example: master
                      name:
                        type: string
                        description: Payment method name.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Payment method name.
                          spa: Nombre del medio de pago
                          por: Nome do meio de pagamento
                        example: Mastercard
                      payment_type_id:
                        type: string
                        description: Payment method type.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Payment method type.
                          spa: Tipo del medio de pago
                          por: Tipo do meio de pagamento
                        example: credit_card
                      thumbnail:
                        type: string
                        description: Payment method thumbnail.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Payment method thumbnail.
                          spa: Thumbnail del medio de pago
                          por: Thumbnail do meio de pagamento
                        example: http://img.mlstatic.com/org-img/MP3/API/logos/master.gif
                      secure_thumbnail:
                        type: string
                        description: Payment method secure thumbnail.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Payment method secure thumbnail.
                          spa: Secure thumbnail del medio de pago
                          por: Secure thumbnail do meio de pagamento
                        example: https://www.mercadopago.com/org-img/MP3/API/logos/master.gif
                  security_code:
                    type: object
                    description: Security code information.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Security code information.
                      spa: Información del código de seguridad
                      por: Informação do código de segurança
                    properties:
                      length:
                        type: number
                        description: Security code's length.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Security code's length.
                          spa: Longitud del código de seguridad
                          por: Comprimento do código de segurança
                        example: 3
                      card_location:
                        type: string
                        description: Security code's card location.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Security code's card location.
                          spa: Ubicación del código de seguridad en la tarjeta
                          por: Localização do código de segurança no cartão
                        example: back
                  issuer:
                    type: object
                    description: Issuer information.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Issuer information.
                      spa: Información del emisor
                      por: Informações do emitente
                    properties:
                      id:
                        type: number
                        description: Issuer Id.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Issuer Id.
                          spa: Identificador del emisor
                          por: Id do remetente
                        example: 24
                      name:
                        type: string
                        description: Issuer name.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Issuer name.
                          spa: Nombre del emisor
                          por: Nome do emitente
                        example: Mastercard
                  cardholder:
                    type: object
                    description: Card holder information.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Card holder information.
                      spa: Información del dueño de la tarjeta
                      por: Informações do dono do cartão
                    properties:
                      name:
                        type: string
                        description: Card holder name.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Card holder name.
                          spa: Nombre
                          por: O nome
                        example: APRO
                      identification:
                        type: object
                        description: Identification information.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Identification information.
                          spa: Información de la identificación
                          por: Informação de identificação
                        properties:
                          number:
                            type: string
                            description: Identification number.
                            x-description-i18n:
                              eng: Identification number.
                              spa: Número de identificación
                              por: Número de identificação
                            example: '19119119100'
                          subtype:
                            type: string
                            description: Identification subtype.
                          type:
                            type: string
                            description: Identification type.
                            x-description-i18n:
                              eng: Identification type.
                              spa: Tipo de identificación
                              por: Tipo de identificação
                            example: CPF
                  user_id:
                    type: string
                    example: '470183340'
                  live_mode:
                    type: boolean
                    example: true

        '400':
          description: Error
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Error
            spa: Error
            por: Erro
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 100--the credentials are required.
                      - 101--the customer already exist.
                      - 102--missing customer id.
                      - 103--parameter must be an object 
                      - 104--parameter length is too large.
                      - 105--the customer id is invalid.
                      - 106--the email format is invalid.
                      - 107--the first_name is invalid.
                      - 108--the last_name is invalid.
                      - 109--the phone.area_code is invalid.
                      - 110--the phone.number is invalid.
                      - 111--the identification.type is invalid.
                      - 112--the identification.number is invalid.
                      - 113--the address.zip_code is invalid.
                      - 114--the address.street_name is invalid.
                      - 115--the date_registered format is invalid.
                      - 116--the description is invalid.
                      - 117--the metadata is invalid.
                      - 118--the body must be a Json object
                      - 119--the card is required.
                      - 120--card not found.
                      - 121--the card is invalid.
                      - 122--the card data is invalid.
                      - 123--the payment_method_id is required.
                      - 124--the issuer_id is required.
                      - 125--invalid parameters.
                      - 126--invalid parameter. You cannot update the email.
                      - 127--invalid parameter. Cannot resolve the payment method of card, check the payment_method_id and issuer_id.
                      - 128--the email format is invalid. Use 'test_payer_[0-9]{1,10}@testuser.com'.
                      - 129--the customer has reached the maximum allowed number of cards.
                      - 140--invalid card owner.
                      - 150--invalid users involved.
                      - 200--invalid range format (range=:date_parameter:after::date_from,before::date_to).
                      - 201--range attribute must belong to date entity.
                      - 202--invalid 'after' parameter. It should be date[iso_8601].
                      - 203--invalid 'before' parameter. It should be date[iso_8601].
                      - 204--invalid filters format.
                      - 205--invalid query format.
                      - 206--attributes to sort must belong to 'customer' entity.
                      - 207--order filter must be 'asc' or 'desc'.
                      - 208--invalid 'sort' parameter format.

          description: Error
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Error
            spa: Error
            por: Erro
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:

                    enum:
                      - unauthorized--unauthorized.
        '404':
          description: Error

            por: Erro

            application/json:

                type: object

                    enum:
                      - not_found--not_found.
    put:
      tags:
        - $ref: '#/tags/checkout-pro'
        - $ref: '#/tags/checkout-api'
      summary: Update card
      x-summary-i18n:
        eng: Update card
        spa: Actualizar tarjeta
        por: Atualizar cartão
      description: Renew the details of a card associated with a customer. Indicate the IDs and send the parameters with the information you want to update
      x-description-i18n:
        eng: Renew the details of a card associated with a customer. Indicate the IDs and send the parameters with the information you want to update
        spa: Renueva los datos de una tarjeta asociada a un cliente. Indica los ID y envía los parámetros con la información que quieras actualizar
        por: Atualize os dados de um cartão associado a um cliente. Indique o ID e envie as informações que você deseja atualizar
      parameters:
        - name: expiration_month
          in: requestBody
          description: Card's expiration month.
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Card's expiration month.
            spa: Mes de expiración de la tarjeta
            por: Mês de validade do cartão
          required: false
          schema:
            type: number
            example: 12
        - name: expiration_year
          in: requestBody
          description: Card's expiration year.
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Card's expiration year.
            spa: Año de expiración de la tarjeta
            por: Ano de validade do cartão
          required: false
          schema:
            type: number
            example: 2025
        - name: cardholder.name
          in: requestBody
          description: Card's name.
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            example: Juan Pérez
        - name: cardholder.identification
          in: requestBody
          description: Card's owner identification
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            example: 27009907
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                token:
                  type: string
                  description: Card Token
                  example: 9b2d63e00d66a8c721607214ceda233a
      responses:
        '200':
          description: success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  id:
                    type: string
                    example: '8987269652'
                  expiration_month:
                    type: number
                    example: 7
                  expiration_year:
                    type: number
                    example: 2023
                  first_six_digits:
                    type: string
                    example: '503143'
                  last_four_digits:
                    type: string
                    example: '6351'
                  payment_method:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      id:
                        type: string
                        example: master
                      name:
                        type: string
                        example: Mastercard
                      payment_type_id:
                        type: string
                        example: credit_card
                      thumbnail:
                        type: string
                        example: http://img.mlstatic.com/org-img/MP3/API/logos/master.gif
                      secure_thumbnail:
                        type: string
                        example: https://www.mercadopago.com/org-img/MP3/API/logos/master.gif
                  security_code:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      length:
                        type: number
                        example: 3
                      card_location:
                        type: string
                        example: back
                  issuer:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      id:
                        type: number
                        example: 24
                      name:
                        type: string
                        example: Mastercard
                  cardholder:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      name:
                        type: string
                        example: APRO
                      identification:
                        type: object
                        properties:
                          number:
                            type: string
                            example: '19119119100'
                          type:
                            type: string
                            example: CPF
                  date_created:
                    type: string
                    example: '2021-03-16T16:08:21.000-04:00'
                  date_last_updated:
                    type: string
                    example: '2021-03-16T16:11:54.294-04:00'
                  customer_id:
                    type: string
                    example: 470183340-cpunOI7UsIHlHr
                  user_id:
                    type: string
                    example: '470183340'
                  live_mode:
                    type: boolean
                    example: true
        
        '400':
          description: Error
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Error
            spa: Error
            por: Erro
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 100--the credentials are required.
                      - 101--the customer already exist.
                      - 102--missing customer id.
                      - 103--parameter must be an object 
                      - 104--parameter length is too large.
                      - 105--the customer id is invalid.
                      - 106--the email format is invalid.
                      - 107--the first_name is invalid.
                      - 108--the last_name is invalid.
                      - 109--the phone.area_code is invalid.
                      - 110--the phone.number is invalid.
                      - 111--the identification.type is invalid.
                      - 112--the identification.number is invalid.
                      - 113--the address.zip_code is invalid.
                      - 114--the address.street_name is invalid.
                      - 115--the date_registered format is invalid.
                      - 116--the description is invalid.
                      - 117--the metadata is invalid.
                      - 118--the body must be a Json object
                      - 119--the card is required.
                      - 120--card not found.
                      - 121--the card is invalid.
                      - 122--the card data is invalid.
                      - 123--the payment_method_id is required.
                      - 124--the issuer_id is required.
                      - 125--invalid parameters.
                      - 126--invalid parameter. You cannot update the email.
                      - 127--invalid parameter. Cannot resolve the payment method of card, check the payment_method_id and issuer_id.
                      - 128--the email format is invalid. Use 'test_payer_[0-9]{1,10}@testuser.com'.
                      - 129--the customer has reached the maximum allowed number of cards.
                      - 140--invalid card owner.
                      - 150--invalid users involved.
                      - 200--invalid range format (range=:date_parameter:after::date_from,before::date_to).
                      - 201--range attribute must belong to date entity.
                      - 202--invalid 'after' parameter. It should be date[iso_8601].
                      - 203--invalid 'before' parameter. It should be date[iso_8601].
                      - 204--invalid filters format.
                      - 205--invalid query format.
                      - 206--attributes to sort must belong to 'customer' entity.
                      - 207--order filter must be 'asc' or 'desc'.
                      - 208--invalid 'sort' parameter format.
        '401':
          description: Error
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Error
            spa: Error
            por: Erro
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - unauthorized--unauthorized.
        '404':
          description: Error
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Error
            spa: Error
            por: Erro
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - not_found--not_found.
    delete:
      tags:
        - $ref: '#/tags/checkout-pro'
        - $ref: '#/tags/checkout-api'
